award_title: CAREER: Optimal Design of Robust Nonlinear Elastic Metamaterials
subject: Your metamaterial design tools should outlive the paper
body:
Francis,

You're developing open-source design software for elastic metamaterialsâ€”tools that could actually get used in soft robotics, prosthetics, deployable structures. But most computational methods die with the paper.

I'm building Ouro, a place to publish your computational workflows as APIs with a Python SDK so other researchers can call your methods directly. Your work becomes infrastructure others build on, not just a paper they cite.

Happy to set you up with access if you want to poke around.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
